title: Ticket #3785: schedd tries to send UPDATE_JOBAD to scheduler universe jobs
description: When a job ad attribute is updated in the schedd, it sends the UPDATE_JOBAD signal to the shadow to tell it to refetch the newly-dirty job ad attributes. This code is not conditionalized on universe. So, when dagman updates attributes in it's own job ad, it results in a ton of error messages in the SchedLog, wherein it tries to send signal number 71005 (!) to the dagman process itself.
